shortdesc.ph: Checks whether the current camera supports Center Stage.

section.p: It is recommended to call this method before calling to enable Center Stage, to confirm whether the current device supports this feature. You must call this method after the camera is successfully enabled, that is, after the SDK triggers the callback and returns the local video state as LOCAL_VIDEO_STREAM_STATE_CAPTURING (1).
section.note: This method is only applicable to iOS and macOS platforms.

section.title: Timing
section.p: You must call this method after the camera is successfully enabled, that is, after the SDK triggers the callback and returns the local video state as LOCAL_VIDEO_STREAM_STATE_CAPTURING (1).

ul.li: : The current camera supports Center Stage.
: The current camera does not support Center Stage.
